text:
The phenomenon that I experienced was that free association, such as drinking alcohol, Living together behavior, rarely performing prayers, rarely praying, online gambling, trapped in usury aka online loans, toxic social interactions (How to have positive social interactions) PMO behavior, drug use, bullying, sexual harassment
My idea is creating content that discusses the social phenomena that I explained above, and I want to create More towards social awareness and education kepada masyarakat untuk kembali ke jalan yang benar dengan melakukan hal hal yang positif dan saya akan memadukannya dengan pendekatan agama Islam dengan tujuan untuk menyadarkan manusia untuk kembali kepada tujuan fitrah manusia diciptakan yaitu beribadah kepada Allah S.W.T dan berusaha untuk mempelajari serta mengamalkan agama Islam seperti pembelajaran mengenai sholat,doa,hadist,Al Qur'an,amalan Sunnah dll selain itu juga mengarahkan agar orang orang yang terjebak di fenomena yang ada diatas untuk mempelajari self development
trans:
The phenomenon that I experienced was that free association, such as drinking alcohol, living together behaviour, rarely performing prayers, praying, online gambling, being trapped in usury aka online loans, toxic social interactions (How to have positive social interactions) PMO behaviour, drug use, bullying, sexual harassment
My idea is to create content that discusses the social phenomena that I explained above, and I want to create more social awareness and education for the people so that they return to the right path by doing positive things and I will combine them with Islamic religious approach with the purpose to awaken humans to return to the natural purpose of human beings that is praying to Allah S.W.T and try to learn and practice the Islamic religion such as the study about sholat, prayer, hadith, Al Qur'an, Sunnah practice etc. In addition, it also teaches people who are trapped in the phenomenon mentioned above to learn self-development.
